articles.author: Felix Martin, Ibrahim Mustapha
articles.title: Barcelona's spending days are over despite big money offer for Ferran Torres - Inside Europe - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Despite their financial woes, Barcelona are reportedly on the brink of completing a big money deal to sign Ferran Torres from Manchester City.
articles.content:
Ferran Torres is close to leaving Manchester City for Barcelona
Image credit: Getty Images

articles.title: Gas prices slide as tankers head for Europe - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Gas prices slumped this morning as a flotilla of US tankers headed for Europe to help ease the continent’s escalating energy crisis.
articles.content:
Good morning. 
We start with the latest figures from the SMMT, which show the UK's car industry recorded its worst November for output since 1984.
Output dropped 28.7pc last month to 75,756 units a… [+2099 chars]

articles.title: European tech for James Webb Space Telescope launch - eeNews Europe
articles.description: Technology from Infineon, Ruag, Cranfield University and Airbus is included in the launch of the world’ s most complex telescope
articles.content:
After 25 years and nearly $10bn, the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) is scheduled to launch on Christmas Day.

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: IndiGo ends 2021 on a high, inks codeshare pact with Air France-KLM - Mint
articles.description: Air France and KLM will open up their global network of over 250 destinations to IndiGo customers with more than 120 destinations in Europe and 50 in Americas.
articles.content:
Budget carrier IndiGo has inked an extensive codeshare agreement with Air France-KLM, an official statement said on Thursday.

articles.author: Morgan Brinlee
articles.title: Covid-19 May Temporarily Lower Sperm Count & Motility, A New Study Shows - Romper
articles.description: New research out of Europe has found that contracting Covid-19 can impair sperm quality, including sperm counts and motility, for months after infection.
articles.content: Couples looking to conceive may have even more reason to avoid contracting Covid-19, according to a new study. In examining semen samples from men whod recently recovered from the virus, researchers … [+3995 chars]
